entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 18.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 18. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 21 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h early in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 21 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
